overview:
Şekip Can Gökalp (28), Co-Founder of Mobilike, is responsible for strategy and business development, publisher and agency relations, marketing, HR, legal and finance.

During his studies at the RWTH-Aachen in Germany, he has worked as a localization consultant with German start-ups such as Mixxt GmbH and Weblin GmbH. He returned to Istanbul as Regional Business Developer for the Belgian Netlog BV, the biggest youngster community of Europe at that time. He left Netlog in 2009 to start Mobilike, which became the leading mobile advertising network of Turkey short after.

Şekip Can Gökalp is a regular contributor to interactive marketing publications and a part-time instructor at İstanbul Bahçeşehir University.
